verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, <S%H8035>Shem<s%>, <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%>: and unto them were <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth<s%>; <S%H1586>Gomer<s%>, and <S%H4031>Magog<s%>, and <S%H4074>Madai<s%>, and <S%H3120>Javan<s%>, and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%>, and <S%H4902>Meshech<s%>, and <S%H8494>Tiras<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1586>Gomer<s%>; <S%H813>Ashkenaz<s%>, and <S%H7384>Riphath<s%>, and <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3120>Javan<s%>; <S%H473>Elishah<s%>, and <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, <S%H3794>Kittim<s%>, and <S%H1721>Dodanim<s%>. Dodanim: or, as some read it, Rodanim

By these were the <S%H339>isles<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> divided <S%H6504>in<s%> their <S%H776>lands<s%>; every <S%H376>one<s%> after his <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, in their <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>; <S%H3568>Cush<s%>, and <S%H4714>Mizraim<s%>, and <S%H6316>Phut<s%>, and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush<s%>; <S%H5434>Seba<s%>, and <S%H2341>Havilah<s%>, and <S%H5454>Sabtah<s%>, and <S%H7484>Raamah<s%>, and <S%H5455>Sabtecha<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah<s%>; <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>, and <S%H1719>Dedan<s%>.
And <S%H3568>Cush<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%>: he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>one<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

He was a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: <S%H3651>wherefore<s%> it is <S%H559>said<s%>, Even as <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H894>Babel<s%>, and <S%H751>Erech<s%>, and <S%H390>Accad<s%>, and <S%H3641>Calneh<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>. Babel: Gr. Babylon

Out of that <S%H776>land<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H804>Asshur<s%>, and <S%H1129>builded<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%>, and <S%H3625>Calah<s%>, went: or, he went out into Assyria the city: or, the streets of the city
And <S%H7449>Resen<s%> between <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> and <S%H3625>Calah<s%>: the same is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And <S%H4714>Mizraim<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3866>Ludim<s%>, and <S%H6047>Anamim<s%>, and <S%H3853>Lehabim<s%>, and <S%H5320>Naphtuhim<s%>,
And <S%H6625>Pathrusim<s%>, and <S%H3695>Casluhim<s%>, (out of whom <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H6430>Philistim<s%>,) and <S%H3732>Caphtorim<s%>.
And <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, and <S%H2845>Heth<s%>, Sidon: Heb. Tzidon
And the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H1622>Girgasite<s%>,
And the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H6208>Arkite<s%>, and the <S%H5513>Sinite<s%>,

And the <S%H721>Arvadite<s%>, and the <S%H6786>Zemarite<s%>, and the <S%H2577>Hamathite<s%>: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> were the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> spread <S%H6327>abroad<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> was from <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>, as thou <S%H935>comest<s%> to <S%H1642>Gerar<s%>, unto <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>; as thou <S%H935>goest<s%>, unto <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and <S%H126>Admah<s%>, and <S%H6636>Zeboim<s%>, even unto <S%H3962>Lasha<s%>. Gaza: Heb. Azzah
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, after their <S%H3956>tongues<s%>, in their <S%H776>countries<s%>, and in their <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Unto <S%H8035>Shem<s%> also, the <S%H1>father<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber<s%>, the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> the <S%H1419>elder<s%>, even to him were children <S%H3205>born<s%>.
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem<s%>; <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and <S%H804>Asshur<s%>, and <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%>, and <S%H3865>Lud<s%>, and <S%H758>Aram<s%>. Arphaxad: Heb. Arpachshad
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%>; <S%H5780>Uz<s%>, and <S%H2343>Hul<s%>, and <S%H1666>Gether<s%>, and <S%H4851>Mash<s%>.
And <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7974>Salah<s%>; and <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5677>Eber<s%>. Salah: Heb. Shelah

And unto <S%H5677>Eber<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>: the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6389>Peleg<s%>; for in his <S%H3117>days<s%> was the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6385>divided<s%>; and his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3355>Joktan<s%>. Peleg: that is Division
And <S%H3355>Joktan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H486>Almodad<s%>, and <S%H8026>Sheleph<s%>, and <S%H2700>Hazarmaveth<s%>, and <S%H3392>Jerah<s%>,
And <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%>, and <S%H187>Uzal<s%>, and <S%H1853>Diklah<s%>,
And <S%H5745>Obal<s%>, and <S%H39>Abimael<s%>, and <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>,
And <S%H211>Ophir<s%>, and <S%H2341>Havilah<s%>, and <S%H3103>Jobab<s%>: all these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3355>Joktan<s%>.
And their <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> was from <S%H4852>Mesha<s%>, as thou <S%H935>goest<s%> unto <S%H5611>Sephar<s%> a <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>.
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem<s%>, after their <S%H4940>families<s%>, after their <S%H3956>tongues<s%>, in their <S%H776>lands<s%>, after their <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, after their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, in their <S%H1471>nations<s%>: and by these were the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6504>divided<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%>.
